  Binary		unsigned decimal	signed decimal

  00000000 00000000	0			 0
  00000000 00000001	1			 1
  00000000 00000010	2			 2
  00000000 00000011	3			 3
  00000000 00000100	4			 4
...
  00000000 11111111	255			 255
  00000001 00000000	256			 256
  00000001 00000001	257			 257
...
  01111111 11111111	32767			 32767
  10000000 00000000	32768			-32768
  10000000 00000001	32769			-32767
  10000000 00000010	32770			-32766
...
  11111111 11111110	65534			-2
  11111111 11111111	65535			-1
1 00000000 00000000	65536 => 0		 0
1 00000000 00000001	65537 => 1		 1
